con:testCase.name: STO_VIPCODE_2
con:testCase.con:description:
Periodic Standing Order Agreement for BM Payment
Created with one user Rejected with one user searched with one user

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID, CUSTBANKID,VIPCODE,ACCOUNTNUMBER from v_authorisation where Customerid=32331684812

con:request.name: SO Auth
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn3="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit><wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key}" value="${Properties#Value}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key1}" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="Logref" value="SOVIP"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#Value}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>${Properties#bankId}</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>${Properties#Key}</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>4744001</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${Properties#accountOwnerIdentifier}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>${Properties#approvalLimit}</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>${Properties#registerLimit}</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>${Properties#numberOfVerifiers}</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>${Properties#numberOfApprovers}</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>${Properties#bookingLevel}</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${Properties#accountOwnerIdentifier}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>999999</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>999999</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>0</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>0</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>D</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO Create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn2="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit><wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key}" value="${Properties#Value}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key1}" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="Logref" value="SOVIP"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> <urn:standingOrder> <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence> <urn1:dueDates> <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate> </urn1:dueDates> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <urn1:exemptions> <urn1:exemption> <urn1:startDate>${Properties#ExceptionStartDate}</urn1:startDate> <urn1:endDate>${Properties#ExceptionEndDate}</urn1:endDate> <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring> <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description> </urn1:exemption> </urn1:exemptions> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:debtorAccount xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_5"> <urn4:identification xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#accountNumber}</urn4:identification> <urn4:currency xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">NOK</urn4:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> </urn1:paymentInfo> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transaction> <urn2:amount> <urn3:instructedAmount currency="NOK" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn3:amount> </urn3:instructedAmount> </urn2:amount> <urn2:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn2:chargeBearer> <urn2:creditorAgent> <urn3:bic xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn3:bic> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode> <urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>testing</urn3:countrySubDivision> <urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country> </urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditorAgent> <urn2:creditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode> <urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>test</urn3:countrySubDivision> <urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country> </urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditor> <urn2:creditorAccount> <urn3:identification xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn3:identification> <urn3:currency xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn3:currency> </urn2:creditorAccount> <urn2:ultimateCreditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> </urn2:ultimateCreditor> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType> </urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO Reject

con:config.con:query: select * from STOH_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'

con:request.name: SO AccountSearch
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentsearch:v1_7" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:search:v1_7" xmlns:con="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com" <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>TESTUSERPI21</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key}" value="${Properties#Value}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key1}" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="Logref" value="SOVIP"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAccountSearchRequest> <urn:searchCriteria> <urn1:commonCriteria> <urn1:elementControl> <con:StartIndex>0</con:StartIndex> <con:MaximumNumberOfElements>50</con:MaximumNumberOfElements> </urn1:elementControl> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn1:debtorAccount>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn1:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:commonCriteria> <urn1:accountCriteria> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:amountMaxMin> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn2:amountMaxMin> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:creditorAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:showHidden>false</urn1:showHidden> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn1:paymentStatus>REJECTED</urn1:paymentStatus> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:requestedExecutionDate> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:dateFromTo> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn2:dateFromTo> </urn1:requestedExecutionDate> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:accountCriteria> </urn:searchCriteria> </urn:PaymentAccountSearchRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
